Ukrainian PM @Yatsenyuk_AP assured me that his government answers people's call for open & modern #Ukraine. Reform, inclusiveness essential.
Today's signature of political provisions EU #Ukraine Association Agreement was opening act: we expect to sign remaining parts soon.
Signature of full Association Agreements with #Georgia and #Moldova has been brought forward to no later than June.
Sanctions against #Russia take legal effect this afternoon. Means to an end: a negotiated solution in respect of international law.
European Council's #energy discussion focused primarily on how to reduce our high energy dependency. EU will step up a gear. (1/2)
EU to work on improving #energy efficiency, diversifying supply routes, expanding energy sources (renewables), security energy supply. (2/2)
Concrete actions #energy on interconnections- details in #EUCO conclusions. Iberian peninsula, Mediterranean area & third countries.
EU leaders asked @EU_Commission to create concrete action plan in time for June #EUCO: basis for comprehensive #energy security framework.
Today we kicked off discussion for #EU2030 #climate goals; mapped out solid road map for new EU target greenhouse gas emissions.
We will meet our 2020 commitments; agreed to increase our ambition. #EU2030 targets to be in line with ambitious long-term objective 2050.
We are ten days away from the #EUAfrica summit. Full scope EU-Africa relations will be discussed; #EUCO singled out peace and security.
We signed this morning the political provisions of the #AssociationAgreement with #Ukraine. #EUCO
We gave a clear and concrete sign of our commitment to #Ukraine and the values that we share.
The political partnership delivers on the democratic choice #Ukraine has made. #EUCO
And it is our firm intention to sign the remaining parts of the agreement in due course. #EUCO
We will help #Ukraine to reform and be the stable, sovereign, democratic & prosperous country its people long for. #EUCO
